parameters.name: MonitorId
parameters.description:
The ID of a monitoring session.

>  To obtain the MonitorId value, call the [CreateLiveStreamMonitor](~~352011~~) operation.

parameters.name: OrderRule
parameters.description:
How monitoring sessions are sorted in the list. The default value is 0. Valid values:

*   0: Monitoring sessions are sorted by status.
*   1: Monitoring sessions are sorted by start time in descending order.
*   2\. Monitoring sessions are sorted by start time in ascending order.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of monitoring sessions to return on each page.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of a monitoring session. Valid values:

*   1: Monitoring
*   0: Unmonitored
